articles.title: Dhanashree posts 'serious note' to take dig at Yuzvendra Chahal's Asia Cup snub - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Chahal later reacted with a positive post on X, but his wife Dhanashree Verma shared a "serious note" on Instagram taking a dig at the snub. | Cricket
articles.content: There one one big notable omission from India's 17-member Asia Cup squad that was announced by the BCCI chief selector Ajit Agarkar, in presence of captain Rohit Sharma, on Monday in New Delhi, as Yu… [+2111 chars]

articles.title: Centre Gives Assurance As Asia's Largest Onion Market Shut For Second Day - NDTV
articles.description: Union Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal said procurement of onion crops at the 'historic' price of Rs 2,410 per quintal - a move in response to protests by farmers over the 40 per cent export duty on the staple vegetable - began at noon on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Fear of skyrocketing onion prices comes after tomato prices touched nearly Rs 300 per kg in some markets.
New Delhi: The centre on Tuesday offered assurances to farmers and traders protesting the de… [+3350 chars]
